entry.title: Network Performance Issues in Atlanta, ATL
entry.content:
Aug 13, 09:01 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Aug 13, 04:41 UTC
Monitoring - Cloudflare has implemented a fix for this issue and is currently monitoring the results.

We will update the status once the issue is resolved.

Aug 13, 04:26 UTC
Identified - Cloudflare has identified the issue and is implementing a fix.

We will update the status once we implement the fix.

Aug 13, 04:08 UTC
Investigating - Cloudflare is investigating issues with network performance in Atlanta.

We are working to analyse and mitigate this problem. More updates to follow shortly.

entry.title: Durable Objects timeouts
entry.content:
Aug 13, 02:21 UTC
Resolved - Cloudflare has resolved the issue and services have resumed normal operation.

Aug 12, 21:48 UTC
Investigating - Cloudflare is investigating issues related to network connectivity to Durable Objects.

entry.title: Delayed JavaScript challenge passes
entry.content:

Resolved - Cloudflare has resolved the issue and services have resumed normal operation.

Aug 12, 19:16 UTC
Monitoring - Cloudflare has implemented a fix for this issue and is currently monitoring the results.

We will update the status once the issue is resolved.

Aug 12, 17:10 UTC
Identified - Cloudflare has identified the issue and is implementing a fix.

We will update the status once we implement the fix.

Aug 12, 17:10 UTC
Investigating - We are currently observing delays in JavaScript challenge passes. We are investigating further and working on a fix. More updates to follow.

entry.title: Elevated 520 errors on Free Zones
entry.content:
Aug 11, 21:30 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Aug 11, 19:13 UTC
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

Aug 11, 16:05 UTC
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

Aug 11, 15:59 UTC
Investigating - We are currently observing elevated 520 errors on our Free zones. We are working to understand the full impact and mitigate this problem. More updates to follow shortly.

entry.title: Issues authenticating using Cloudflare Access in certain data centers

Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

entry.title: Increased errors from the API in saving firewall rules
entry.content:
Aug 11, 08:30 UTC
Resolved - Between 09:10-09:40 UTC, customers would have experienced increased errors from the API in saving firewall rules.

entry.title: Browser Isolation Availability Issues
entry.content:
Aug 10, 21:47 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Aug 10, 20:52 UTC
Monitoring - Cloudflare has implemented a fix for this issue and is currently monitoring the results.

We will update the status once the issue is resolved.

Aug 10, 19:03 UTC
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

Aug 10, 19:03 UTC
Investigating - Cloudflare is investigating issues with the Browser Isolation service. Customers that use Browser Isolation may observe errors when attempting to load sites through the service. This issue does not affect any other Cloudflare services.

We are working to mitigate this problem. More updates to follow shortly.

entry.title: Issue with Cloudflare Pages
entry.content:
Aug 10, 17:11 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Aug 10, 17:00 UTC
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

Aug 10, 16:30 UTC
Investigating - Cloudflare Pages is experiencing issues with GitHub API requests and Pull Requests. See more information on the GitHub issue here: https://www.githubstatus.com/incidents/rmfrw9dfbtbp

This issue only affects the deployment of Cloudflare Pages sites. Sites that are already deployed are not affected.

entry.title: Cloudflare Registrar Issue
entry.content:
Aug 5, 08:36 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Aug 5, 07:51 UTC
Identified - Cloudflare has identified the issue and is implementing a fix.

We will update the status once we implement the fix.

Aug 5, 07:11 UTC
Investigating - Cloudflare is investigating issues with Registrar. We are working to understand the full impact and mitigate this problem. More updates to follow shortly.

entry.title: Cloudflare Dashboard and Cloudflare API service issues
entry.content:
Aug 5, 06:07 UTC
Resolved - Cloudflare has resolved the issue and services have resumed normal operation.

Aug 5, 05:51 UTC
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

Aug 5, 05:35 UTC
Investigating - Cloudflare is investigating issues with Cloudflare Dashboard and related APIs.

These issues do not affect the serving of cached files via the Cloudflare CDN or other security features at the Cloudflare Edge.

Customers using the Dashboard / Cloudflare APIs are impacted as requests might fail and/or errors may be displayed.

entry.title: Cloudflare for Teams: Gateway Issues
entry.content:
Aug 4, 22:23 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Aug 4, 22:20 UTC
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

Aug 4, 21:35 UTC
Identified - Cloudflare has identified the issue and is implementing a fix.

We will update the status once we implement the fix.

Aug 4, 21:22 UTC
Investigating - Cloudflare is investigating issues with the HTTP proxy component within Gateway. Performance and connectivity through Gateway may be impacted.

We are working to understand the full impact and mitigate this problem. More updates to follow shortly.

entry.title: Argo tunnel connection propagation delay
entry.content:
Aug 4, 19:07 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Aug 4, 19:02 UTC
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

Aug 4, 18:46 UTC
Investigating - Cloudflare is investigating delays when creating new Cloudflare Tunnel connections. Existing Tunnels are not impacted, but restarting could cause delays in reconnections.

entry.title: Upcoming Datacenter Upgrades
entry.content:
Aug 3, 17:30 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Aug 3, 17:00 UTC
Scheduled - Throughout the month of August 2021, we will be performing maintenance on various datacenters. Each window will be between 1am-6am local time of the data center. There is a possibility of a slight increase in latency during these maintenance windows. The most up-to-date schedule can be located here: Planned maintenance for Cloudflare data centers.

entry.title: Increased HTTP 522 Errors
entry.content:
Jul 30, 08:00 UTC
Resolved - Cloudflare investigated and resolved issues with an increased level of HTTP 522 errors around 0845 - 0910 UTC.

entry.title: Cloudflare Edge Side Code (ESC) Issue
entry.content:
Jul 29, 23:56 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Jul 29, 21:12 UTC
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

Jul 29, 20:57 UTC
Investigating - Cloudflare is investigating an issue where some conditions create issues for Edge Side Code (ESC). Further detail will be provided as more information becomes available.

entry.title: Cache Purging Delays
entry.content:
Jul 29, 18:27 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Jul 29, 13:31 UTC
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

Jul 29, 13:16 UTC
Investigating - Cloudflare single-file cache purging (purge by URL) called via the Dashboard/API is delayed.

We are working to resolve this issue as soon as possible. Until then you may use the Purge Everything feature but do be aware it may cause a surge in traffic to your origin server(s). More updates to follow.

Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

Investigating - Cloudflare is investigating issues with Stream. We are working to understand the full impact and mitigate this problem. More updates to follow shortly. Video playback of existing videos on Stream is not impacted.

entry.content:
Jul 28, 11:25 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Jul 28, 11:00 UTC
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

Investigating - Cloudflare is investigating issues with Cloudflare for Teams Dashboard.

entry.title: Cloudflare is investigating reports of issues with single-file cache purging (purge by URL).
entry.content:
Jul 28, 03:14 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Jul 28, 03:04 UTC
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

Jul 28, 02:26 UTC
Investigating - Cloudflare single-file cache purging requests (purge by URL) called via the Dashboard/API may fail.

We are working to resolve this issue as soon as possible. Until then you may use the Purge Everything or Purge by Hostname feature but do be aware it may cause a surge in traffic to your origin server(s). More updates to follow.
